text: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَكَفَّرۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَلَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

translation.en: And if only the People of the Scripture had believed and feared Allah, We would have removed from them their misdeeds and admitted them to Gardens of Pleasure
translation.id: Dan sekiranya Ahli Kitab itu beriman dan bertakwa; niscaya Kami hapus kesalahan-kesalahan mereka dan mereka tentu Kami masukkan ke dalam surga-surga yang penuh kenikmatan
